Reference

Read and clean data

Functions and supporting data inputs to read and clean each year of the HES data.

read_hes()

Read the HES data files

read_hes_scot()

Read the Scottish Hospital Episode Statistics data files

clean_hes()

Clean HES

clean_hes_scot()

Clean Scottish Hospital Episode Statistics

define_spells()

Define spells

append_hrg_codes()

Append HRG codes

sample_selection()

Reduce size of HES to sample required

sample_selection_scot()

Reduce size of HES to sample required - Scotland

local_authority()

Local authority lookup

Identify tobacco and alcohol related hospital care

Functions and supporting data inputs to assign diagnoses as the cause of episodes or spells of care, and to calculate the population rates of care for these diagnoses.

icdFlag()

Scan episodes for matching International Classification of Disease codes

findEpisodes()

Search for episodes with the target International Classification of Disease diagnoses

assignPAFs()

Assign population attributable fractions to diseases

assign_risk()

Reducing the HES data to alcohol/tobacco-related episodes and admissions

broad_method()

Broad method for allocating risk

narrow_method()

Narrow method for allocating risk

pop_data()

Add the population counts by age band, sex, IMD quintile

cruk_split_oesophageal()

Split Oesophageal cancer cases into AC and SCC subtypes

Calculate the costs of hospital care

Functions and supporting data inputs to assign unit costs to tobacco and alcohol related hospital care.

calc_cost_admission()

Calculate unit costs of risk-related admissions by sex, age, IMD and condition

hes_cost()

Cost episode-level HES data

Package data

Pre-prepared data inputs embedded in the package

paf_data

Example population attributable fractions

cruk_splits

Proportion of oesophageal cases split by AC and SCC

local_authority_lookups

Local authority lookup table - old ONS system

local_authority_lookups1

Local authority lookup table - new ONS system
